comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quant it is still able to maintain its price quite well. It has been pumping so hard from bottom to the current rate with very small supply at this moment and i think quant will able to go back to the ATH again as long as bitcoin will break new ATH. Rosalid project was a new project between quant with some important entities in england. That's why it was triggering a pump right now. https://twitter.com/quant_network/status/1669653300671553536That's pretty interesting to see the outcome from this project.
